body: He really thinks the guy will turn gay for him? He just may become a shut in and not want to see anyone, even him.
For those who do not understand, the friend was gay, and he realized that the girl was an obstacle for him, so he got rid of her.
THAT WHYYYY, THAT THE FUCKING REASON
Why most people (especially woman) afraid or scared with blackmail?
a true friend, he noticed that the girl was a potencial horn, soo he get her caught before she could do emotional harm to his precious friend
This is so satisfying, ohh the feeling so goods ahaaaaa, i'm coming...

If that is where the series stood, all may have been fine. But it escalates, and they, and just about everyone else surrounding them, wants more, more, until nothing remains in their hollow lives but sex and sleaze. It becomes impossible to feel any empathy for them and the grief they are constantly plunging themselves into. They're beyond saving. They deserve everything that happens to them. And so, I cannot bring myself to care when it tries to play the girl as the victim/the tragic heroine. The real victim here is the bf for being deceived by such deplorable people. Love is blind, as the cheesy proverb goes, but in this case, they must also be blind in the literal sense.
